Package etomica.normalmode

Interface WaveVectorFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WaveVectorFactory1D, WaveVectorFactory2D, WaveVectorFactoryFcc, WaveVectorFactoryFromFile, WaveVectorFactorySimple, WaveVectorFactorySuperBox

    public interface WaveVectorFactory
    Interface for a class the returns the appropriate wave vectors for a box and primitive

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double[] getCoefficients​()
      Returns the coefficients for the wave vectors returned by getWaveVectors.
      Vector[] getWaveVectors​()
      Returns the wave vectors generated by makeWaveVectors
      void makeWaveVectors​(Box box)
      Tells the instance to make wave vectors appropriate for the given box.

    • Method Detail

      • makeWaveVectors

        void makeWaveVectors​(Box box)
        Tells the instance to make wave vectors appropriate for the given box. The wave vectors will not include the 0 vector, any two vectors which are opposites or any wave vector that is redundant with another.

      • getWaveVectors

        Vector[] getWaveVectors​()
        Returns the wave vectors generated by makeWaveVectors

      • getCoefficients

        double[] getCoefficients​()
        Returns the coefficients for the wave vectors returned by getWaveVectors. If two of the wave vectors are redundant, their coefficient will be 0.5. Others will have a coefficient of 1.0.
